content: आपीड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Giving pain, hurting. {@--2@} Squeezing, compressing. {@--3@} A chaplet (tied on the crown of the head), garland in general; चूडापीडकपालसंकुलगलन्मंदाकिनीवारयः <ls>Māl. 1. 2.</ls> {@--4@} (Hence <ab>fig.</ab>) A crest jewel; तस्मिन्कुलापीडनिभे विपीडं <ls>R. 18. 29</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">6</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">7.</ls>
